## Quality Check

Please confirm the following:

- [ ] The resource is relevant to tech learning and education
- [ ] The link is working and points directly to the resource
- [ ] The entry follows the formatting guidelines: `- [Name](url) - Description.`
- [ ] The resource is placed in alphabetical order within its category
- [ ] No duplicate entry exists in the list
- [ ] The description is clear, concise, and ends with a period
- [ ] I have read the [CONTRIBUTING.md](../CONTRIBUTING.md) guidelines
